title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Fry pancetta until crispy. Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl. Drain pasta and combine with pancetta. Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture. Season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of roasted marinated chicken in a spiced curry sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka paste for 1 hour. Grill chicken until cooked. Fry onion, add remaining paste, then coconut cream. Add chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a variety of fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef served in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan. Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes. Warm taco shells. Fill shells with beef and top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Add egg and mix. Fold in flour and chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet. Bake at 180Â°C for 12 minutes.
